pages.text: The Sequential Fabricator is a machine that automatically crafts items. Once the recipe in the crafting grid is set, it will take items and liquids from its internal inventory and craft them. Recipes that take a bucket of a particular fluid and leave an empty bucket behind can be crafted using liquid from the internal tank instead.
